Matching tattoo: The claim was verified by the presence of a matching tattoo on both a page selfie and prominent news outlets' pictures of Connor Betts.
Family linkages: The claim was supported by several family linkages to the social media page, including similar photos of Betts and the family dog, as well as references to college and growing up in Ohio and Dayton.
Twitter removal: Twitter's removal of the page shortly after the shooting further lends support to the authenticity of the claim.
Archived snapshots: Archived snapshots of Betts' Twitter account confirm the claims made in the headline, including references to being a pro-Satan leftist and expressing support for Elizabeth Warren.
